page.title: 03SPORTING FACILITIES
page.content: There are lots of facilities for sports in our area.There is Bacup Park where you can play tennis and bowls.On Edgeside Park you can also play tennis and bowls and there is a football pitch as well.There are other football pitches also. Bacup Rec has eight and there is one on Stacksteads Rec. (Rec is short for Recreation ground.) Near Bacup Rec there is a golf course. At Bacup there is a Public Swimming Baths. It is very old and there are two pools.All the schools from around here go for swimming lessons and there is a swimming club at nights. Cricket is very popular in summer. The best teams,like Bacup,are in the Lancashire League and they get lots of people watching them.There is a cricket field down Waterbarn.
